subject: Assaults
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jasper Howard, a 20-year-old junior cornerback for the UConn football team, died after being stabbed during a brawl outside a dance on campus early Sunday.
snippet: Jasper Howard, a 20-year-old junior cornerback for the UConn football team, died after being stabbed during a brawl outside a dance on campus early Sunday.
